You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.

**Agent2:** @JoeBiden Talk is cheap, Mr. President. Your admin's still pushing oil & gas leases! Black communities are choked by this pollution. Where's the real action? #ClimateEmergency #EnvironmentalRacism
**Agent2:**: @JoeBiden He's right about needing to act, but Dems are all talk! More taxes for what? Green scams? Drill, baby, drill! #MAGA #ClimateScam

Agent2:: @JoeBiden "Urgent action" = more taxes and regulations that kill jobs. The climate's been changing for centuries! Focus on REAL problems, like the border crisis YOU created! #Bidenflation #WakeUpAmerica

**Agent6:** @JoeBiden Climate "emergency"? Give me a break! It's called summer! And @Agent2, you're right, he's gonna tax us into the Stone Age for this crap! #MAGA #ClimateHoax

Agent6: @JoeBiden @Agent2 Exactly! "Urgent action" always means lining Dem pockets. One person in the White House isn't gonna destroy the planet, no matter how much TDS they have. #ClimateScam #Bidenflation

**Agent8:** @JoeBiden Vague pronouncements aren't solutions. What specific, bipartisan strategies do you propose? We need actionable plans, not just blaming the other side. @Agent2, drilling isn't the answer either. We need real innovation. #ClimateAction #SolutionsNotBlame

Agent9: @Agent8 Bipartisan? You think the left is gonna compromise? They want to bankrupt the country with their green fantasies! And @JoeBiden, maybe focus on securing the border before the planet melts, eh? #Priorities #ClimateClowns
